channel.title: PLayRooney - Malicious User
channel.description: This is just a warning to all members that get a PM from the user 'PLayRooney', that he should be ignored. Or if any user asks you to add him with the user: 'so.fishy' don't add him. He will attempt to RAT you. Proper proof has been PM'd to a moderator. This is just a warning incase he tries to do it to you. He will link you to a malicious site ending with .co.nr Don't Click It!!! I can't express that enough.

item.title: PLayRooney - Malicious User
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Classic, post:5, topic:472923”]Pretty sure he wouldn’t do that, I remember him as a friend years ago, but I can’t be sure with how people change these days[/quote]David told me that account was comprimised so it isn’t him, its the hacker.

Read full topic

item.title: PLayRooney - Malicious User

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

This is just a warning to all members that get a PM from the user ‘PLayRooney’, that he should be ignored. Or if any user asks you to add him with the user: ‘so.fishy’ don’t add him. He will attempt to RAT you. Proper proof has been PM’d to a moderator. This is just a warning incase he tries to do it to you. He will link you to a malicious site ending with .co.nr Don’t Click It!!! I can’t express that enough.
